description: Try our easy to follow Red Velvet Cake With Summer Fruit recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Red Velvet Cake With Summer Fruit
name: Red Velvet Cake With Summer Fruit Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Stack the 3 cake layers on top of each other. Finish with the last cake layer. Transfer cake to a cake stand. Using a flat palette knife, spread the remaining buttercream over the top and side of the cake. Decorate top with remaining raspberries, strawberries and cherries.
